name: Throw It!
description:
You are in a mysterious land filled with snow, in which you have a crystal you must protect. This crystal is the thing keeping you from dying, and without it, you will perish. The reason you must protect this crystal is because the habitants of this planet want to get rid of you, so they have build robotic snowmen to destroy you and your crystal. Do what you must; build a base, place turrets, craft useful items, explore this strange world, but most importantly, survive.

A game by : 

Jed, a programmer and modeler

Lionel, our music man and designer

Logan, our concept artist and also our designer

And finally, Locke, who tells us to stop fighting
